name: Fivetran
interviewRounds:
1. OA – SQL queries, Python scripting, ETL logic, DSA
2. Tech Interviews (2) – SQL optimization, database schema design, Python logic, project discussion
3. HR – Resume, culture fit, communication
description: Leading data integration platform helping companies make their data warehouse analytics-ready.

name: LG AD Solution
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Python + ML MCQs, basic CV/NLP logic
2. Tech Interview – Deep Learning models, real-world ML application, past projects
3. Managerial + HR – AI roadmap discussion, team fit
description: LG's advertising technology division focusing on AI-driven advertising solutions.

name: ServiceNow
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Java/JS coding, logic puzzles
2. Tech Interviews (2) – REST APIs, OOPs, DSA, platform development scenarios
3. HR – Behavioral questions
description: Cloud computing platform providing enterprise service management software.

name: Gojek
interviewRounds:
1. OA – DSA (Medium to Hard), Time complexity
2. Tech Interviews (2–3) – Backend architecture, API design, basic system design, coding
3. HR – Values, adaptability
description: Southeast Asian on-demand multi-service platform and digital payment technology.

name: JP Morgan
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Aptitude, DBMS, OOPs, Coding (Java/Python)
2. Tech Interview – DSA, SQL joins, OOP design
3. HR – Team fit, scenario-based questions
description: Leading global financial services firm with strong technology division.

name: Nutanix
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Python, OS concepts, cloud basics
2. Tech Interviews (2) – Linux, Cloud deployment models, system troubleshooting
3. HR – Work culture, motivation
description: Enterprise cloud computing company specializing in hyper-converged infrastructure.

name: D.E Shaw
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Quant + Logical reasoning, puzzles
2. Tech Interviews (2) – Python/C++, probability/stats, brain teasers
3. HR – Communication, interest in finance-tech
description: Quantitative investment management firm using computational technology.

name: VMware
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Linux MCQs, scripting basics
2. Tech Interviews – Shell scripting, CI/CD pipelines, DevOps toolchains
3. HR – Project experience, adaptability
description: Leading provider of cloud computing and platform virtualization software.

name: JTP Japan
interviewRounds:
1. Resume Shortlist
2. Aptitude Test – Quant + Logic (easy)
3. HR Interview – Communication, Japanese culture adaptability
description: Japanese technology consulting firm offering international business opportunities.

name: Amazon
interviewRounds:
1. OA (Coding) – 2 DSA problems (Medium–Hard)
2. Tech (2–3 Rounds) – DSA, System Design (L1), leadership principles
3. HR – Amazon Leadership Principles
description: Global e-commerce and cloud computing giant with extensive technology operations.

name: Cisco
interviewRounds:
1. OA – Networking MCQs, DSA, OS
2. Tech (1–2) – Python scripting, troubleshooting scenarios
3. HR – Situational questions
description: Multinational technology company specializing in networking hardware and software.

name: Philips Healthcare
interviewRounds:
1. Resume Shortlist
2. Tech + HR – Embedded systems, Biomedical signals, team questions
description: Healthcare technology company focused on improving patient outcomes through innovation.

name: Josh Technology
interviewRounds:
1. OA (Coding) – 2 DSA questions
2. Tech Interviews (2) – React/Java-based design questions, problem solving
3. HR – Goals, cultural alignment
description: Technology consulting company specializing in software development and digital solutions.

name: Amadeus
interviewRounds:
1. OA – DBMS + Java/SQL questions
2. Tech (2) – Data modeling, backend service design, SQL joins
3. HR – Role expectations, projects
description: Travel technology company providing IT solutions for the global travel industry.

name: Schneider Electric
interviewRounds:

2. Tech + HR – Power systems, IoT sensors, team collaboration
description: Global specialist in energy management and automation providing integrated solutions.

name: ZS Associates

description: Management consulting and technology firm focused on sales and marketing solutions.

description: UAE-based conglomerate with diverse business interests across multiple sectors.

name: Accenture
